ai-mil3.1.14:1.3_0: “Great king, all skillful qualities are vassals of immersion, whatever things are seen, heard, thought, known, sought, and explored by the mind.”
ai-mil3.1.14:2.2_0: “Great king, the rafters of a bungalow all lean to the peak, slope to the peak, and meet at the peak, so the peak is said to be the topmost of them all.
ai-mil3.1.14:2.3_0: In the same way, all skillful qualities are produced in immersion, cream, immersions, and attainments have slants, slopes, and inclines to immersion.”
ai-mil3.1.14:3.2_0: “Great king, if the king were to stay with the army of four divisions, the army of four divisions, the cavalry, the chariots, and infantry, the thunder of the drums,
ai-mil3.1.14:3.3_0: In the same way, all skillful qualities are produced in immersion, cream, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-mil3.1.14:3.4_0: That’s how immersion is due to developing immersion further.
ai-mil3.1.14:3.5_0: I have been spoken by the Buddha, great king, and
ai-mil3.1.14:3.6_0: A mendicant develops immersion. They truly understand immersion.”
